document.masterDocTitle: A new species of Limnocoris Stål (Heteroptera: Naucoridae: Limnocorinae) and new state records for species of the genus in Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of Limnocoris Stål (Heteroptera: Naucoridae: Limnocorinae) and new state records for species of the genus in Mexico

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution .
Limnocoris insularis
is distributed from central-eastern Mexico south to Costa Rica ( Rodrigues & Sites 2019 ). In Mexico , most of the records are in the south ( Fig. 3 ). The range of the species includes the southern part of the Veracruzan ( Chiapas , Oaxaca , Veracruz ) and Pacific Lowlands ( Chiapas , Oaxaca ) biogeographic provinces.

Material examined .
